# Matthieu Queloz — publications site

This site contains a portfolio of academic philosophy publications with abstracts and (when available) PDF links.

Canonical base URL: https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/

Languages:
- English: https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/
- Français: https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/fr/
- Deutsch: https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/de/

Key indexes:
- Sitemap (all pages): https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/sitemap.xml
- Search index (JSON): https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/search.json

Where to find publications:
- Entries list (EN): https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/theoretical-philosophy/ , https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/practical-philosophy/ , https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/history-of-philosophy/
- Individual entries are under: https://www.matthieuqueloz.com/entries/

Metadata:
- Entry pages include machine-readable citation meta tags and schema.org JSON-LD (ScholarlyArticle).
